article_title: President Donald Trump Would Destroy The Bond Market

article_metadata.author: Jared Dillian

og.description: Trump wants to raise spending, particularly on infrastructure and the military, build a wall along our Southern border, and turn Obamacare into Trumpcare. As it stands now, our deficit is about $450 billion, or 3% of GDP. Under Trump, we could see our deficit go to 10% of GDP or more—in peacetime—without a financial crisis.
